trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays a list of data items.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kontroll som viser en liste med dataelementer som.

trans-unit.source: ListView is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Listevisningen blir er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, som betyr at den kan inneholde en samling objekter av en annen type (for eksempel streng, image eller panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The presentation of the data items in a ListView is defined by its view mode, which is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Presentasjonen med dataelementer i en listevisningen blir er definert av visningsmodus, som er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode that partitions the ListView data item content into columns.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]gir et <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningsmodus som partisjonene listevisningen blir data elementinnholdet til kolonner.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The properties and methods on <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and its related classes style and specify the content of the columns.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper og metoder på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>og de relaterte klassene style angi innholdet i kolonnene.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ListView with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser en listevisning med en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: ![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") You can also define custom views by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: ![Listevisning med GridView utdata](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "listevisning med GridView utdata") du kan også definere egendefinerte visninger ved å opprette en klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: opprette en egendefinert visningsmodus for en listevisningen blir](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you define a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> for a ListView control and also define an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>, you must include a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du definerer en egendefinert <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>for en listevisningen blir kontrollere og også definere en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>du må inkludere en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is required for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>kreves for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>skal fungere riktig.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: To avoid alignment issues in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, do not add content or set properties that affect the width of an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> of a ListView.
trans-unit.target: Unngå problemer med justering i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningsmodus, ikke legge til innhold eller angi egenskaper som påvirker bredden på et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>av en listevisningen blir.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To prevent alignment issues, use properties and templates that are defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode.
trans-unit.target: For å unngå problemer med justering, bruker du egenskaper og maler som er definert for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This includes properties and templates that are defined for classes that are used in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter egenskaper og maler som er definert for klasser som er brukt i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>visningsmodus, for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Two ListView controls cannot share the same view.
trans-unit.target: To listevisningen blir kontroller kan ikke dele samme visning.

trans-unit.source: To specify a view that can be used more than one time, use templates or styles.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en visning som kan brukes mer enn én gang, bruker du maler eller stiler.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and other custom views that are defined as reusable resources, see [ListView with Multiple Views Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160013).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>og andre egendefinerte visninger som er definert som gjenbrukbart ressurser, kan du se [listevisning med flere visninger utvalg](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160013).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> properties for ListView content that is displayed by using a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Ikke bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>Egenskaper for listevisningen blir innhold som vises ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the alignment of content in a column of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Angi justeringen av innholdet i en kolonne med en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>definere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Visning av et stort antall elementer, kan det føre til ytelsesproblemer.

trans-unit.source: See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [optimalisere ytelsen: Kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ListView Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ListView controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse listevisningen blir kontrollen til i gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere listevisningen blir kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Gi kontrollen unikt utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ListView, see [ListView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for den listevisningen blir, kan du se [listevisningen blir stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ListView control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i listevisningen blir kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Removes all templates, styles, and bindings for the object that is displayed as a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle maler, stiler og bindinger for objektet som vises som en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> container to clear.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> beholder for å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: The object that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> contains.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> inneholder.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> container.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> beholderen.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et objekt er en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal evalueres.

trans-unit.source: if the item is a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the item is a ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Defines an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> objekt den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Responds to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.OnItemsChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.OnItemsChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when there is a change in the items collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når det er en endring i elementsamlingen i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Argumentene hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the styles, templates, and bindings for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir stiler, maler og bindinger for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method prepares a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control for display according to the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden Klargjør en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>kontroll for visning i henhold til den angitte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: An object that is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> or that can be converted into one.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> eller som kan konverteres til en.

trans-unit.source: The object to use to create the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal bruke til å opprette den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that defines how the data is styled and organized in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som definerer hvordan dataene stilen og ordnet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] environment includes the configurable view mode named <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] omfatter konfigurerbare visningsmodus navnet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can also create a custom view that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også opprette en egendefinert visning som arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [slik: opprette en egendefinert visningsmodus for en listevisningen blir](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| > [!NOTE] > The type of property metadata for this property is , not .
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen | > [!NOTE] > Egenskapmetadata for denne egenskapen er , ikke .

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"></xref> object that specifies how to display information in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase"> </xref> objekt som angir hvordan du vil vise informasjonen i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
